seg.quote: The judges' decision is final and no correspondence will be entered into.

sense.def:
Correspondence
se nanaša tudi na pisma, ki jih kdo prejme.

seg.quote: The letter had been among his correspondence that morning.

sense.def:
Če je med dvema stvarema
a correspondence
, je med njima tesen odnos ali velika podobnost.

seg.quote: In African languages there is a close correspondence between sounds and letters.
